Configure the Spoon

Method.name: configure

Method.doc:
Manually check for updates

Parameters:
 * showNoUpdate - boolean, show notification even when no update available

Returns:
 * The ClaudeTasks object
Method.name: checkForUpdates

Method.doc:
Bind hotkeys for the Spoon

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table with hotkey mappings

Returns:
 * The ClaudeTasks object
Method.name: bindHotkeys

Variable.desc:
Configuration table with the following keys:
 * width - Window width (default: 420)
 * height - Window height (default: 580)
 * margin - Screen margin (default: 20)
 * refreshDebounce - File watcher debounce (default: 0.2)
 * debugMode - Enable debug logging (default: false)
 * checkForUpdates - Check for updates on start (default: true)
 * updateCheckInterval - Update check interval in seconds (default: 86400)
Variable.name: config

desc: Claude Code Task Viewer - A floating WebView-based task viewer for Claude Code tasks
doc:
Claude Code Task Viewer - A floating WebView-based task viewer for Claude Code tasks

Download: https://github.com/jongwony/ClaudeTasks.spoon/releases

This Spoon provides a floating task viewer that displays tasks from ~/.claude/tasks/
name: ClaudeTasks
